summary: Implemented an in-app i18n context with a LanguageToggle button, integrated translations into key UI components, and added localStorage persistence. Diff also includes several unrelated UI/theme and component behavior changes not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Global visual/theme changes (new OKLCH palette and Tailwind theme extensions).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for a Spanish language toggle and local frontend string localization; it did not request visual redesign/theme updates.

hallucinated_features.description: SEO/title/meta/icon changes in the HTML entry point.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (which focused on language toggle and translations).

hallucinated_features.description: Behavioral changes to dish image handling (resetting error state on photoReference changes) and decorative image error-hiding wrapper.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; these are unrelated enhancements to image rendering robustness.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query hook changes for getFoodRecommendations mutation wrapper and typing.
Added/changed localized validation messages in validation helper.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope was translating UI strings in specific components; validation localization is extra functionality beyond explicitly requested components/strings.
